effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 1.4 million over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 673,404.

Set: When your Power Word: Shield is completely absorbed on an ally, they are granted Insurance! at 40% effectiveness. Allies with your Insurance! or absorption effects receive 15% increased healing from you.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Vengeful Gladiator's Mooncloth Hood

spells.description: Equip: Your spells have a chance to imbue the wax, causing it to form into a blazing candle for 15 sec which increases your Versatility by 3,355, further increased by 881 while you remain within its light.

Equip: Your healing spells and abilities have a chance to summon Mister Pick-Me-Up for 6 sec, firing a healing beam every 2 sec that jumps between 5 injured allies to restore 93,982 health each.

Overhealing from this effect irradiates allies to deal Nature damage to nearby enemies over 1.5 sec, increased by additional overhealing.

Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Secrets of the Void
